channel.title: Career Opportunities in Appdy on Appdy
channel.description: Recent content in Career Opportunities in Appdy on Appdy

item.title: Magento Developer
item.description: We are looking for a talented Magento Developer to join our team. We don’t care how old are you, where you are from, what are your personal preferences, or what drives you. We want to cultivate a respective work place, where professional attitude matters the most. The only thing we care about is if you can take a job and deliver. You don’t have to have plenty of experience (but that helps).
